channel.title: Command
channel.description:
As long as it took i finally got jail to work :) Only problem is players can use ::home to leave. How do i make an exception so they cant use ::home to teleport while in jail? My base is Pi and this is the jail i added to my source. anyone? Help pls.
http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/237981-project-insanity-jail-system.html
